definition: if only it were so/I hope so (idiom)

sentences.english: B: I hope I have time to see them all.
sentences.chinese: 但願我有時間一飽眼福。

sentences.english: i hope something will bring you to new york soon so that i can reciprocate your kindness.
sentences.chinese: 但願不久您能有機碰到紐約來，使我能答謝您的美意。

sentences.english: Good luck, let's hope he is not afraid of hitchhikers.
sentences.chinese: 祝你走運，但願他不害怕路人搭車。

sentences.english: I don’t know if that’s finished or not yet. I hope so.
sentences.chinese: 我也不知道搞沒搞定呢，但願都沒問題了吧。

sentences.english: I wish you wouldn't keep sniffling.
sentences.chinese: 但願你別總這麼抽鼻子。

sentences.english: Hopefully, I can do everything online.
sentences.chinese: 但願一切我都能在網上完成。

sentences.english: I would like my boyfriend to send me a bunch of flowers on my birthday.
sentences.chinese: 但願我男友在我生日那天給我送一束花。

sentences.english: I hope you and I are an endless song.
sentences.chinese: 但願我和你，是一隻唱不完的歌。

sentences.english: If only bad habits could be broken as easily as hearts!
sentences.chinese: 但願壞習慣象心一樣易碎。

sentences.english: This site will save some resouces, i wish it can be saved without time limited.
sentences.chinese: 這裏會存放一些資源，但願，能永久保存。

sentences.english: I wish I'd never seen such crazy goings-on .
sentences.chinese: 但願我從不曾見過如此瘋狂的行爲。

sentences.english: I wish I had not taken that.
sentences.chinese: 但願我剛纔沒有喫東西纔好。

sentences.english: I wish you were my brother.
Hopefully you have a copy of the practice exam.
sentences.chinese: 但願你們都做了這份習題。

sentences.english: I do not know. -- I hope there was.
sentences.chinese: 我不清楚，但願他們並沒有全都知道。

sentences.english: Were not, as 'twere, the merest mask of gloom
sentences.chinese: 但願它不只是一張陰鬱的面具，。

definition: in the end/after all is said and done
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
to seem/to appear/(in a negative or interrogative sentence) to be sure
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
